document_data.name: Dramar Lornen
document_data.mainbody: '''Dramar Lornen''' was a collector from the "Royal Keep" of [[Ironhar]] in [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]].
document_data.Background: Dramar was obsessed with the [[Dawn Titan's Spire]], and, as of [[1479 DR]], she had hired many adventurers and agents in all of Laerakond to investigate any clues that would allow Dramar to gain entry to the Spire.
